title: Seeing Afflicted Person Dua
description: Authentic supplications for Seeing Afflicted Person Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Seeing Afflicted Person Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 194
items.arabic: ((الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي عَافَانِي مِمَّا ابْتَلاَكَ بِهِ، وَفَضَّلَنِي عَلَى كَثِيرٍ مِمَّنْ خَلَقَ تَفْضِيلاً)).
